  • Qurat Shah

    This Book "Garden of Pain" is a collection of Qurat Shah Writings. The book is splitted into three (3) sections. -The first section of the book is a collection of writings that have been written in English Language.

  • Shaista Hameed

    Shaista Hameed's poems serve the message of oneness. She had also shared the feelings of joy, sadness and fear at the same. Some of her poems pleasantly remind every human to love the fellow human.

  • Eliyas Johnjoseph
